channel.title: Need help with ip on client
channel.description: i downloaded ocean x client how do i change ip i went into client.java and searched for server = but gui.server = j option pane .showinput came up wat do i do?

item.title: Need help with ip on client
item.dc:creator: @DeathSlay DeathSlay
item.description:
@DeathSlay wrote:

go to gui.java and do ctrl + f

and type in System.out.println
under that line it should be Serverip = "127.0.0.1";

change the 127.0.0.1 or what ever ip is there to yours
localhost is 127.0.0.1 or 0.0.0.0

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with ip on client
